#Peer-graded Assignment: Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project
This repository shows how to run analysis on the Human Activity recognition dataset. The dataset has data on Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones A codebook and script have been included in the file.  The cript performs the 5 required steps to transform and prepare the data. Merges the training and the test sets to create one data set. Extracts only the measurements on the mean and standard deviation for each measurement. Uses descriptive activity names to name the activities in the data set.  Appropriately labels the data set with descriptive variable names. Creates a second, independent tidy data set with the average of each variable for each activity and each subject.
